title: James Sheehan-The Mayor of Lexington Avenue (Mobi)
description:
Growing up on the mean streets of New York City, Johnny and Mikey always had each otherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s backs. Mikey was a loyal friend but even he knew that Johnny was headed for bigger things. ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s why he dubbed him the Mayor of Lexington Avenue.
 
The two friends were inseparableÃ¢â‚¬â€until one fateful night set them on their different paths: Johnny to life as a  high-powered lawyer in Miami, and Mikey to a shattered existence behind bars. Now, haunted by guilt over MikeyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s conviction, and numbed by the excesses of a successful life, Johnny finds his one last shot at redemption: A young Florida man is framed for a murder he didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t commit, and Johnny feels compelled to fight for himÃ¢â‚¬â€and, in a way, for Mikey. But there are powerful people who want the truth hidden, and Johnny will have to risk everything, and everyone, he cares about to save the young manÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and himself.
